ygData.subject: shadowmen drops
ygData.msgSnippet: How often do the shadowmen drop the nec items, besides the scythe?  I hunted them for a few hours killing at least 50 in nek last night and got a few scythe
ygData.messageBody:
How often do the shadowmen drop the nec items, besides the scythe? I hunted
them for a few hours killing at least 50 in nek last night and got a few
scythe drops and the shadowmen item for the boots (only one though, luckily
the other nec i was with already had the boots). They did drop quite a few
shining gems and some enchanter quest stuff, but as you can see, very rare
for other nec stuff. Does each zone spawn drop the items more frequently
like the camp in commons drop the componant for the robe and the ones in
innoth drop the componants for the gloves?

thanks
